```{r}
# Import data
xcorr <- read.csv(file = "8_t_tests/data/maximum.csv")
```

**Same-talker**
```{r}
same_talker <- get_one_sample_t(subset(xcorr, condition = "talker", level = "S"))
head(same_talker)
```

**Different-talker**
```{r}
different_talker <- get_one_sample_t(subset(xcorr, condition = "talker", level = "T"))
head(different_talker)
```

**Meaningful**
```{r}
meaningful <- get_one_sample_t(subset(xcorr, condition = "meaning", level = "M"))
head(meaningful)
```

**Nonsense**
```{r}
nonsense <- get_one_sample_t(subset(xcorr, condition = "meaning", level = "N"))
head(nonsense)
```

**Low constraint**
```{r}
low_constraint <- get_one_sample_t(subset(xcorr, condition = "constraint", level = "L"))
head(low_constraint)
```

**High constraint**
```{r}
high_constraint <- get_one_sample_t(subset(xcorr, condition = "constraint", level = "H"))
head(high_constraint)
```
